title: Disturb Not The Dream
description: A five-year old screams in her sleep...A bloodied man hovers over a nubile teenage girl...A mysterious beauty makes love to a ripe teenage boy...And a family must face the terrifying truth that ties them to a horrifying past â€” and leads them towards a bloodcurdling future...Disturb Not The DreamA heart-stopping tale of unrelenting fear.
author: Paula Trachtman
